name: Viking Chess
description:
Hnefatafl or Viking Chess is a tense strategy game pitting an outnumbered "King's army" against overwhelming odds.

Which side will you be on?

*Features*

  • Undo function
  • Highlight path, showing you where your character can move
  • Beautifully drawn game board and characters
  • Humorous voice-overs
  • A unique alternative to chess
  • A computer AI with two difficulty settings
  • Two new game modes
  • Play as either side in any of the game modes
  • Color-blind mode with three color choices
  • Stat tracking
